CART.LOGIN_HINT: You must log in to view your cart

HOME.WELCOME_P1: Welcome to Dani J, the international artist revolutionizing the world of bachata! With over 300 concerts in recent years, Dani J has established himself as one of the genre’s leading figures.
HOME.P2: Born in SEVILLE, Spain, he has taken his music to more than 30 countries, including England, France, Italy, Switzerland, Germany, the Netherlands, Denmark, Siberia, Romania, Cyprus, Russia, Poland, Greece, Portugal, Brazil, the United States, Mexico, Australia, Tunisia, Israel, Argentina, Chile, Ecuador, the Dominican Republic, Thailand, Vietnam, Korea, Japan, and Singapore.
HOME.P3: Dani J’s talent for reinventing himself and blending bachata with contemporary influences has lifted the genre to new heights. His versatility as a dancer, singer, producer, composer, and musician leaves a lasting impact on every stage he graces.
HOME.P4: Dani J shines not only for his musical prowess but also for his charisma and dedication to his fans. His heartfelt lyrics resonate across cultures and generations, forging emotional connections everywhere he goes.
HOME.P5: Dani J! Who could ask for more?

BIOGRAPHY.TITLE: Biography
BIOGRAPHY.P1: Dani J is one of today’s most versatile and innovative Latin music artists. Internationally acclaimed as Europe’s top bachata performer, since 2014 he has revolutionized the genre by fusing it with Pop, Flamenco, Trap, and R&B to create a unique, border-transcending style.
BIOGRAPHY.P2: His passion for music was born in his native Seville, where his flamenco roots merged with hip-hop, R&B, and Latin influences—shaping an unparalleled artistic vision. His global breakthrough came in 2016 with the EP “Quitémonos la ropa,” landing him among Google Play Music’s Top 10 Most Promising Artists—the only Spaniard to do so.
BIOGRAPHY.P3: Dani J’s journey is a testament to perseverance and artistic growth. From flamenco beginnings to global collaborations, each chapter has forged the multifaceted artist he is today, continually redefining bachata’s modern sound.

SUCCESS.TITLE: INTERNATIONAL SUCCESS:
SUCCESS.INTRO: With over 360 concerts in more than 30 countries, Dani J’s music has reached all five continents. His work has captivated audiences in:

LIST.ITEM1: EUROPE: France, Italy, Switzerland, Germany, the Netherlands, Poland…
LIST.ITEM2: ASIA: Japan, Korea, Thailand, Singapore, Vietnam, Taiwan…
LIST.ITEM3: AMERICAS: United States, Mexico, Brazil, Argentina, Chile…

SUCCESS.P2: His track “TOKYO” (2024) blends Japanese culture with bachata, exemplifying his unique ability to build cultural bridges through music.

INNOVATION.TITLE: INNOVATION & GROWTH:
INNOVATION.P1: In 2022, Dani J launched his own label, “13 PRO MUSIC,” showcasing his entrepreneurial vision and commitment to artistic authenticity.
INNOVATION.P2: Hits like “7 pecados,” “Caprichito,” “Piscina,” and collaborations such as “Rosas” with Kewin Cosmos and “Atemporal” with Danny Romero highlight his continuous evolution.

LEGACY.TITLE: LEGACY & FUTURE:
LEGACY.P1: With over 350 million streams across platforms, Dani J keeps pushing Latin music’s boundaries. His reinvention and pursuit of excellence make him a cornerstone of contemporary bachata.
LEGACY.P2: More than a singer, Dani J is a multifaceted artist—dancer, producer, composer, and musician—crafting immersive musical experiences for global audiences.
LEGACY.P3: In 2025, he embarks on an ambitious world tour, adding new hits to his repertoire and cementing his role as an international bachata ambassador.
LEGACY.P4: Try Dani J once, and you’ll come back for more!

DESCRIPTION.TITLE: Videos
DESCRIPTION.P1: Dani J knows visuals matter: beyond great songs recorded around the world, he’s created a vast video catalog that transports you through his music and stories.
DESCRIPTION.P2: Get ready for a unique audiovisual experience! In the videos tab, you’ll find direct links to Dani J’s YouTube channel:
DESCRIPTION.P3: Subscribe to enjoy a wide variety of high-quality videos.
DESCRIPTION.P4: Alongside official music videos, you’ll find acoustic versions, behind-the-scenes footage, lyric videos, and much more.

DESCRIPTION.TITLE: Tour Details
DESCRIPTION.P1: Get ready for an unforgettable experience with Dani J on his 2025 world tour!
DESCRIPTION.P2: Want to know more? Check his social channels!
DESCRIPTION.P3: See concert dates and locations. If ticket links aren't live yet, don’t worry—they’ll be available soon.

INTRO.P1: Reach out via the form or through Dani J’s and 13 PRO MUSIC’s social media.
INTRO.P2: We’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

BASE1.TITLE: RULE 1 – OBJECTIVE
BASE1.P1: EMPTYSTAVE MUSIC RECORDS LTD, located at EFESOU 9, PARALIMNI, 5280 FAMAGUSTA, CYPRUS (Tax ID 60091184X), for its artist Dani J, launches the “Baila con Dani J” promotion to reward followers by inviting selected fans to dance on stage during his Latin America tour.

BASE2.TITLE: RULE 2 – DURATION
BASE2.P1: The promotion runs from April 10, 2025 to October 9, 2025 at 23:59.
BASE2.P2: Winners will be chosen by an expert jury and notified at the time of announcement.

LIST.ITEM1: Joining Dani J on stage to dance at concerts in Argentina, Chile, Uruguay, and Peru during the 2025 tour.
LIST.ITEM2: Prize does not include concert ticket; winners must purchase their own.

BASE4.TITLE: RULE 4 – PARTICIPANTS
BASE4.P1: Open to anyone 18+ except employees, family, agencies, and associated parties of the promoter and 13 PRO MUSIC. Immediate family up to first degree are excluded.
BASE4.P2: Participation implies full acceptance of these rules.
BASE4.P3: Participants must certify they meet all contest conditions; false declarations may lead to disqualification.
BASE4.P4: Participation is voluntary and does not create an employment relationship; Dani J, his team, and associated parties are not liable for choreography execution or incidents.
BASE4.P5: The participant expressly accepts that going up to dance with Dani J does not imply an employment or commercial relationship of any kind, and is completely voluntary on their part. Likewise, the participant excludes Dani J, his team, producer or similar personnel from any type of liability in relation to the execution of the choreography and/or any incident or damage that may occur with its execution.

LIST.ITEM1: Follow @OficialDaniJ on the platform where you enter.
LIST.ITEM2: Post a video on Instagram or TikTok using Dani J’s official music from the April 9–11, 2025 posts, featuring one of the choreographies.
LIST.ITEM3: Winners chosen based on originality and talent.
LIST.ITEM4: Selected participants will be contacted via direct message by Dani J.

BASE6.TITLE: RULE 6 – PRIZE DISTRIBUTION
BASE6.P1: The organization will contact winners via direct message to arrange the collaboration.

BASE7.TITLE: RULE 7 – PUBLICITY & IMAGE USE
BASE7.P1: Winners’ names will be published on Dani J’s official social media stories.
BASE7.P2: Participation grants permission for such publication.
BASE7.P3: Winners consent to being recorded for later social media sharing.
BASE7.P4: Winners grant free use of their name and image in promotional materials.
BASE7.P5: Prize does not create any employment or commercial relationship; participation is voluntary.

BASE8.TITLE: RULE 8 – LIABILITY
BASE8.P1: Promoter and agencies are not liable for any personal or property damage resulting from participation.
BASE8.P2: Promoter and suppliers disclaim liability for any additional contest aspects.

BASE9.TITLE: RULE 9 – IMAGE & VOICE LICENSE
BASE9.P1: By accepting a prize, winners grant a license to use their image, voice, and registration content digitally across 2024–2025 without additional compensation.

BASE10.TITLE: RULE 10 – DATA PROCESSING
BASE10.P1: In compliance with current regulations on the protection of personal data, we inform you that the participants' data are incorporated into the processing of personal data:
BASE10.P2: IDENTITY OF THE CONTROLLER: EMPTYSTAVE MUSIC RECORDS LTD. Address at Calle EFESOU 9, PARALIMNI, 5280 FAMAGUSTA, CYPRUS. Tax number 60091184X.
BASE10.P3: SOURCE OF DATA: The personal data processed comes from the interested party himself.
BASE10.P4: The categories of interested parties treated are: Participants in the contest.
BASE10.P5: The categories of data processed are: Identification, postal and/or electronic addresses, landline/mobile telephone numbers, age, number of children and, in the case of winners, image and videos.
BASE10.P6: PURPOSES: We process the personal data that you provide us with the purpose of managing your participation in this promotional action. Likewise, the purpose will be the promotional actions in which the winners participate, in accordance with the terms and conditions of use of the image that are set out in Base 11 and in the rest of the bases of the promotion.
BASE10.P7: No profiles will be created or automated decisions will be made based on the information provided.
BASE10.P8: DATA CONSERVATION: The data will be kept as long as its deletion is not requested, during the mandatory legal periods and, at least, for a minimum period of 5 years from the last interaction.
BASE10.P9: LEGITIMATION OF PROCESSING: The processing of your data is carried out under the consent granted when participating in the contest.
BASE10.P10: CONSENT: By participating in the contest you accept the bases and expressly consent to the processing of data for the stated purposes.
BASE10.P11: RECIPIENTS: The data will not be communicated to third parties except as provided in current legislation.
BASE10.P12: RIGHTS: Interested parties have the right to access, rectify and delete their data, as well as to limit or oppose processing in certain circumstances.
BASE10.P13: You have the right to contact the Data Protection Officer at the address indicated above to request clarifications, queries, suggestions or complaints, or to exercise the rights set out in this Data Protection Information.
BASE10.P14: Likewise, you have the right to expand the information and make any queries or complaints you consider appropriate to the Spanish Data Protection Agency (AEPD), with address at Jorge Juan street, nº 6, 28001 Madrid.
BASE10.P15: In certain circumstances, the Interested Parties may request the limitation of the processing of their data, which will be kept only for the exercise of the right of defense against claims and/or litigation, and during the legal periods required for its conservation.
BASE10.P16: In certain circumstances, interested parties may object to the processing of their data. In that case, your data will no longer be processed, with the only exceptions being legitimate reasons, for historical, artistic or research reasons, to defend against claims, or as provided for in current regulations.
BASE10.P17: You have the right to contact the Data Protection Officer at the address indicated above to request clarifications, queries, suggestions, complaints, or to exercise the rights set out in this Data Protection Information.
BASE10.P18: Likewise, you have the right to expand the information and make any queries or complaints you consider appropriate to the Spanish Data Protection Agency (AEPD), with address at Jorge Juan street, nº 6, 28001 Madrid.

BASE11.P1: Claim period ends 15 days after contest closes.

INTRO.P1: This website uses cookies for the purposes described below. Controller details:

COOKIES.TITLE: What Are Cookies?
COOKIES.P1: Cookies are files stored on your device when you browse the web. They collect data depending on their purpose.
COOKIES.P2: By origin: first-party or third-party; by lifespan: session or persistent; by purpose: technical, analytical, advertising, etc.

DURATION_LIST.ITEM1: Session cookies: deleted when the browser closes; Persistent cookies: remain until expiry.

PURPOSE_LIST.ITEM1: User-input cookies: support logins, carts, etc.
PURPOSE_LIST.ITEM3: Security cookies: enhance security against repeated login attempts.
PURPOSE_LIST.ITEM4: Multimedia session cookies: store technical data for audio/video playback.
PURPOSE_LIST.ITEM6: UI customization cookies: personalize site appearance (language, etc.).
PURPOSE_LIST.ITEM7: Social plugin cookies: enable content sharing modules.

USED.TITLE: Used Cookies
USED.P1: By using this site you consent to essential, first- and third-party cookies.

CookieConsent.NAME: CookieConsent
CookieConsent.PURPOSE: Stores user consent state for cookies on this domain.

_ga.NAME: _ga
_ga.PURPOSE: Distinguishes users with a unique ID.

_gat.NAME: _gat
_gat.PURPOSE: Limits request rate to improve performance.

ADMINISTER.TITLE: How to Manage or Disable Cookies
ADMINISTER.P1: Below are links to major browser guides for managing or disabling cookies:

EFFECTS.TITLE: Effects of Disabling Cookies
EFFECTS.P1: You can still browse the site, but some features may not work and your experience may be limited.

CHANGES.TITLE: Policy Changes
CHANGES.P1: We may update this policy to reflect new cookies, legislative changes, or content requirements. Please review it regularly.
